aspguidp.service.core.atom.impl

Class SimpleAtomHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidp.service.core.atom.impl.SimpleAtomHub
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomHub

    public class SimpleAtomHub
extends java.lang.Object
implements AtomHub
    Basic implementation of the AtomHub interface which uses array lists to store registered AtomSupplier instances and registered AtomConsumer instances.
